  • Constructor Details

    • Building3D

      public Building3D​(javafx.scene.Group g, int i, int j)
      Instantiates a new Building 3D.
      Parameters:
      g - the group to add the building, which is the same of the Board3D
      i - the X coordinate on the board
      j - the Y coordinate on the board

    • select

      public void select()
      Select this Building3D. Shows this building's collider, with color yellow.

    • selectRed

      Select red. Shows this building's collider, with color red.

    • unselect

      public void unselect()
      Unselect this building. Hides its collider.

    • unselectNotRed

      public void unselectNotRed()
